resources.string:
This is a special release intended to force a fresh version install in the hope that that will fix a problem one unlucky user in Josephine County, OR is having with Cadpage continusously aborting. If this does not work, use the Email the Developer feature to contact us.
 
 New Locations:
 Lincoln County, OR
 
 Location Parsing Fixes:
 Shelby County, AL
 Lehigh County, PA
 Anderson County, TN
 Loudoun County, VA
 Yakima County, WA
